title: Efficient Business Insolvency System
description: In 2024, Croatia achieved a score of 91.67 in the Business Insolvency Pillar 2, highlighting the country's robust institutional and operational infrastructure for handling judicial insolvency proceedings.

title: Swift Export Customs Clearance
description: As of 2023, Croatia boasts an average time of just 1.1 days to clear exports through customs, showcasing its efficient customs procedures.

title: High Tuberculosis Case Detection Rate
description: In 2023, Croatia reported a tuberculosis case detection rate of 190%, indicating a highly effective health surveillance system for identifying cases.
